io.robusta.rra.client

Interface Callback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleCallback

    public interface Callback
    Callback called after a request is done.
    Author:
    robusta web

      • onFailure

        void onFailure(RestException failure)
        A failure occurs after datas are sent into the web. There might be no return, unvalidated by the server, or there is a server error. 400-500 failure response. Status code is available through the client ; This method may be implemented only once or a few time for the whole application
        Parameters:
        failure - contains the status code and a message
